title: The Worst Unboxing of All-Time
description:
Greg breaks the Indiana Jones Collector's Edition. Thanks @bethesda for the gift! Also, sorry @bethesda for breaking the gift. 

From this episode of KFGD: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GyW1-Vt4GVI&t=3389s


FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!

transcript_chunks.text: scared the hell out of with the biggest box I've ever seen look at that it's here Indiana Jones great circle collector edition just show up guys it's not a circle it's a rectangle it's got storage I'm really excited to see what the jumbo steel book looks like what's a jumbo steel book I'm very excited it's bigger than a normal steelbook oh it wasn't a bigger steelbook it was a thick boy Ste thick with two C's y'all so check that out thick Tim Tim take a look at that when it's thick thick that's it is really thick it is surprisingly thick I thought it would be tall but no oh don't forget about your keychain nice I like a good big box for a collector's edition especially one that can house Tim Tim is 6 feet tall and we've covered him with a box here it's a globe ladies and gentlemen got a Hing okay it's got a hinge yeah we see that holy okay I think there might have been a collapse on game and deck building step number two to access the globe's hidden storage attach the plane magnet to
